events.name: Division U International Speech & Table Topics Contest
events.description:
Have you ever wonder how toastmasters can help individuals bring impact and influence to their speeches? Catch it all in our Division U International Speech & Table Topics Contest this Saturday, 28 April 2018 at the posh and plush SIM Management House,  41 Namly Avenue.  You will get to watch our toastmasters make the best use of what they have learnt from club meetings to bring their speeches to greater heights. The best part is, you get to attend this contest with refreshments provided, FOR FREE!  To travel to SIM University, check out this directory: http://www.streetdirectory.com/asia_travel/travel/travel_id_8173/travel_site_28621/get_here/
For further enquiries on the event, contact us at enquiry@toastmasters-divu.sg
events.location: SIM Management House, 41 Namly Avenue, Lee Foundation Auditorium, Singapore 267616

events.name: Design is a Dialogue
events.description: The Design Innovation Singapore community will come together every month to chat, socialize and have a dialogue about topics such as Human-centered Design, Design Thinking in different industries, Creativity in Teams and Innovation Practices in Organizations. We welcome all creatives, innovators, startup entrepreneurs, technologists, consultants, bankers, educators, policy makers and everyone interested in Design Innovation in Singapore. Come and meet an interdisciplinary group, make the right connections and build the Design Thinking / Innovation community Singapore. See you from 5 pm. We have limited spaces of 25 people. Please only sign up, if you are attending or release your space, if you can't make it. Thank you.
events.location: National design center, 111 middle road, Singapore

events.name: Introduction to WordPress (W1) - For SMEs/Property Agents/Web Designers
events.description:
Introduction to WordPress (W series) - For SMEs/Property Agents/Web Designers
This is a free introductory course for those who are interested to find out more about WordPress. This is a basic introductory course, so this is not for you if you already have experience using WordPress.

Course Criteria
If you are…


A web designer or web developer interested to start building WordPress websites


a WordPress website owner and want to learn how to maintain it


a WordPress.com blogger and want to find out how to maximise it


a business owner/property agent who desires a simple way to create and manage your own budget website


Looking to revamp your own website with something more dynamic


Exploring WordPress courses to attend, but not sure if you are ready for it



Course Outline


What is a CMS? What is WordPress? WordPress.com vs WordPress.org


Why WordPress? The Pros and Cons of Using WordPress


What do you need to install WordPress?


How does WordPress work? Posts & Pages; Themes & Plugins


Maintaining & Updating WordPress



Course Format
Each class has a maximum of 10 people, and group discussions are frequently held throughout the session. You are recommended to bring your own laptops as you will be given an opportunity to practise using WordPress during the course.

Course Fee
This is meant to be a free introductory session. At no point before, during or after this course will we collect a fee for your participation in this course. Light snacks and drinks will be provided.

Other Notes
This course will start and end on time. Please notify Oangle if you are unable to make it. This class will only go ahead if there are at least 4 participants. You will be notified in case of cancellation by 1PM on the day of the course.

Please feel free to contact Oangle if you have any questions about this course.

events.name: QuantCon NYC 2018 - Livestream Tickets Available, Paid
events.description: QuantCon 2018 (http://www.quantcon.com), Quantopian’s fourth annual algorithmic trading and quantitative finance conference, returns to NYC April 27th-28th! Tickets are on sale now at http://www.quantcon.com.  Livestream tickets for the conference day, April 28th, are also available at www.quantcon.com. You will be able to listen to the talks live and receive the recording months before the general public! QuantCon brings community members together with experts from the data science, machine learning, quantitative finance, and programming fields, to learn from and share ideas with each other. QuantCon 2018 will feature workshops, tutorials, and talks focused on how data science and machine learning can help you improve your trading strategies. Learn more at http://www.quantcon.com . April 27th – Workshop Day Bundle your conference ticket with a workshop ticket for the full QuantCon experience. Choose between the “Introduction to Algorithmic Trading” workshop or the “Advanced Algorithmic Trading” workshop. April 28th – Main Conference Day Listen to talks from professionals in the field. Some confirmed speakers include: · Dr. Kathryn Kaminski, Visiting Scientist, MIT Laboratory for Financial Engineering · Dr. Stephen Malinak, Chief Data Analytics Officer at TruValue Labs · Dr. Ernest Chan, Managing member at QTS Capital Management, LLC. · Dr. Jess Stauth, Managing Director of Investments at Quantopian More speakers will continue to be added in the coming weeks. You can check out our lineup at http://www.quantcon.com .
events.location: Grand Hyatt New York, 109 East 42nd Street, Singapore
